hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path of #the hero#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Serenade of Water#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: One who does not have Triforce can't go in.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #giant pot in the Shadow Temple# holds #an Ice Trap#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Serenade of Water#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Ganon's Castle Small Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.
